originalText.text: Besides boasting an impressive curated collection of guitars of all variety, the staff there is absolutely phenomenal; helpful, nice, laid-back, funny, anything you can name. All I bought was a set of strings but stayed for conversation and trying out a guitar for about an hour. Best time I spent in any store in NYC, period. Will defintely come back, especially to buy a guitar - they actually planned on placing an order of a specific guitar I was looking for, further proving the reliability of the staff in this store. Absolutely phenomenal, would and will recommend this store to any guitar fanatic visiting or living in NYC.

originalText.text:
Visited as a tourist from the UK. My wife and I were passing by and I persuaded her for us to go in.
I had a wholly pleasant and memorable service. The shop was stunning and the person on the till was very friendly! I ended up buying a slide and played my first baritone (pictured). If you’re in NYC, pay it a visit and support local music businesses.

originalText.text: Nothing but praise to Brothers Guitar.  The binding around the front and back edges of my Martin was coming off.  I searched for a shop and found that Brothers are certified by Martin to make repairs, so I figured good place to try.  Besides Carlos, doing a great job on the repair, Brothers advised me ahead of bringing it in to register online with Martin.  I did, and the cost of repair was covered by Martin.  I'm not sure every shop would be so great about making sure I didn't go out of pocket.  Great customer service, super friendly and the work replacing the binding was top notch.  This is my go to for repair and set ups now.  Thank you Brothers.

originalText.text: Wonderful local guitar shop with knowledgeable and friendly staff for all ages! Simply put,  if you’re looking for something a bit more personal than the big chains, these guys are it. Big shout outs to Sergio and Carlos for the great work on my dreadnought. Sergio is a walking encyclopedia of rock, and Carlos took great care of my instrument!

originalText.text: Friendly staff and good selection of guitars and gear. Had some unique pieces as well that were made from cigar boxes! Definitely worth a visit!
